# Tests error when flag value is not a valid Go identifier

! muxt generate --output-routes-func="not-an-identifier"

stderr 'value must be a well-formed Go identifier'

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "template.gohtml"))
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}Hello{{end}}
